meanings.definition: A company controlled by a holding company.
meanings.sent1: The large corporation had many subsidiaries under its control.
meanings.sent2: The subsidiaries of the parent company specialized in different industries.
meanings.sent3: The subsidiaries of the main company threw a surprise party for their parent!
meanings.sent4: The subsidiaries were like branches of a tree, each serving a different purpose.
meanings.sent5: The subsidiaries were like puzzle pieces, fitting perfectly into the larger picture.

meanings.sent1: The main focus was on the primary project, while the subsidiaries tasks were secondary.
meanings.sent2: The subsidiaries details were not as crucial as the main storyline.
meanings.sent3: The cake was delicious, but the subsidiaries cookies were just as tasty!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the main melody, with the subsidiaries giggles adding a harmonious touch.
meanings.sent5: The main character shone brightly, with the subsidiaries characters adding depth to the story.
